forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
